data.title: 以至少 50 个字回答问题
data.content: "Should gambling be legal? Why or why not? Give specific reasons for your answer."
data.answer: The controversial issue in respect of gambling, in today's society, has attracted huge public attention and sparked a heated debate. Personally, I believe that gambling should be made illegal. The primary reason is that, without a doubt, gambling has brought great tragedies to countless families because it consumes a lot of money and time. Some people are so addicted to it that they care about nothing else in their life. Therefore, gambling should be made illegal. （75 字）
